content: ear warmer in malabrigo by kate morgan for fun knits yarn shop i don t always need a hat but i get earaches if there is a cold wind in the winter ear warmers are the perfect solution now i want one in every colourway materials malabrigo worsted sample in colourway emerald quantity approx 1/4 of a skein size 4 5mm u s 7 circular needle stitch marker pattern stitch round 1 *knit 2 purl 2 *repeat to end round 2 *knit 2 purl 2 *repeat to end round 3 *knit 2 purl 2 right twist purl 2 *repeat to end round 4 *knit 2 purl 2 *repeat to end right twist knit 2 together do not slide stitches off left needle insert right needle tip between the two stitches and knit the first stitch again then slide both stitches off the needle method cast on 80 stitches join to work in the round work the 4 round pattern 5 times cast off in pattern and weave in ends
